mapper.sql: a.table_name AS "name", CASE a.table_type WHEN 'BASE TABLE' THEN a.table_comment ELSE '' END AS "comments", a.table_type AS "source"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM information_schema.tables a
WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database())

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.tables a
a.TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database())

SELECT
FROM information_schema.tables a
a.TABLE_SCHEMA = (select database())
ORDER BY ${order}
ORDER BY name ASC

SELECT a.name AS 'name', case WHEN se.value IS NULL THEN '' ELSE se.value end AS "comments", 'BASE TABLE' AS 'source' FROM sys.objects a LEFT JOIN [sys].[extended_properties] se ON a.object_id = se.major_id AND se.minor_id = 0 WHERE a.type = 'U';

SELECT lower(ut.TABLE_NAME) AS "name", case WHEN utc.COMMENTS IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE utc.COMMENTS end AS "comments", utc.table_type AS "source" FROM user_tables ut LEFT JOIN user_tab_comments utc ON utc.TABLE_NAME = ut.TABLE_NAME
